oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Characterization and conformational studies of a novel trinitro steroid using 2D-NMR
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KATOCH, R
SRIDHARAN, R
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: nuclear-magnetic-resonance
fast atom bombardment
mass-spectrometry
ion-source
solids
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Conformational analysis of nitro substituted 4-en-3-one steroids has been further investigated using high resolution 2D-NMR techniques. An attempt on the preparation of 6 beta-nitrocholest-4-en-3-one resulted in a new trinitro steroid, 2,2,6 beta-trinitrocholest-4-en-3-one. These compounds have been characterized using COSY, HETCOR, NOESY experiments and the probable pathways to these products have been discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INDIAN CHEMICAL SOCIETY, 75(10-12), 543-547
